titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress with respect to relocating the United States Embassy in Israel to Jerusalem.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: 6/20/2007--Introduced. States that Congress maintains its commitment to relocating the U.S. Embassy in Israel to Jerusalem, and urges the President, pursuant to the Jerusalem Embassy Act of 1995, to begin such relocation.
